author: Staff Reporter
text: Unidentified persons broke into a house at Thirukkanur near here and decamped with seven sovereigns of jewellery on Thursday. According to police personnel, miscreants broke into the house of Govindan (37), a vegetable vendor who is residing in Mariamman Kovil Street on Thursday night and fled with seven sovereigns of jewellery and Rs.4,000 in cash kept in the almirah. The incident came to light when Govindan returned to his house on Friday. A case has been registered.
title: House burgled at Thirukkanur
